hotels.title: Sauve Savannah Hotel Boasting Prime Historic District Location
hotels.description: Outside you're surrounded by antebellum Southern beauty, inside mix it up with modern flair at The Kimpton Brice Hotel. Enjoy stylish spacious rooms offering mutiple views at different angles of Washington Square, historic downtown or the outdoor garden pool. Treat yourself to a relaxed ambience at the Pacci Italian Kitchen + Bar or lounge poolside with a specially made cocktail in hand after a day out on the town exploring.
